title: I didnâ€™t get a chest for Lux?
body: I recently played a game with Lux and a teammate of mine got an S, yet I received no chest for her. I have the ability to get one for her and I had only played her 2-3 times as of then, and that was the first one I should’ve gotten.. Am I missing something?

replies.body: Go to collection, and check if there is a gold border, it will say specifically if you have gotten a chest already.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=AvBmkEat,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-01-15T01:45:14.985+0000)
>
> Go to collection, and check if there is a gold border, it will say specifically if you have gotten a chest already.

This. Since the new season hasn't technically started yet, Chests are still working off last season.

I.e. if you got a chest last season for Lux you can't earn a new one til the new season starts
Thatâ€™s the thing, I have 2 chests available to earn, and Iâ€™ve never earned a chest on her before. I donâ€™t see why it didnâ€™t give me one...

> [{quoted}](name=MissWulfy,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=AvBmkEat,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2019-01-18T20:05:22.230+0000)
>
> Thatâ€™s the thing, I have 2 chests available to earn, and Iâ€™ve never earned a chest on her before. I donâ€™t see why it didnâ€™t give me one...

well I know some reward stuff isn't going out right, so it is possible that hextech chest rewards got slopped in
That's pretty annoying.. well at least it didn't take one of my chests I can get and not give me anything. Thank you for the info and help, I appreciate it

are you sure you have chests up? you can only earn so many chests in a certain time period, check your profile and look at the chest icon under the banner. if the number under it is 0, then you have to wait for your chests to reset.

Yeah, I know how the chest earning system works and there is definitely something wrong. I shouldâ€™ve gotten a chest for that so itâ€™s pretty frustrating for me, especially since Iâ€™m trying real hard to save up for Slyas ðŸ˜­
